1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"A man greeted the Prophet (with Salam), and he was urinating, so he did not respond to him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَرَاهَةِ رَدِّ السَّلاَمِ غَيْرَ مُتَوَضِّئٍ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Retum The Salam If One Does Not Have Wudu
